content: मी {vI.v} {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> (मीनाति, मीनीते; seldom used in classical literature) {@--1@} To kill, destroy, hurt, injure. {@--2@} To lessen, diminish. {@--3@} To change, alter. {@--4@} To transgress, violate. {@--5@} To disappear, be lost. {@--6@} To stray, go astray. {vII.v} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (मयति, माययति-ते) {@--1@} To go, move. {@--2@} To know, understand (गतिमत्ययोः). {vIII.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (मीयते) To die, perish.
